ygData.subject: Re: Server Emulator
ygData.msgSnippet: This bring up something that I would love to see...if we all got our hands on emulators and could submit quests that we have written on them to Verant than
ygData.messageBody:
This bring up something that I would love to see...if we all got our hands
on emulators and could submit quests that we have written on them to Verant
than maybe they would be implemented, or at least Verant might gain some
quest ideas they hadn't thought of before.

No, it wouldn't be NEARLY as good as real server, but it might be cool to
give Verant some ideas how how the players would make EQ if they could
change the world around as they wanted to.

that and maybe players could come up with their own spells, mobs, items,
zones, anything and submit them to Verant...I think it'd be a great resource
for Verant to enhance the game.

Omeg


>none of the NPC quests were there... you would have had to make your >own
>via an editor
